data.title: 'Le Bureau des Légendes' Season 5 and an Interview With Creator Éric Rochant
data.meta_description: Listen to this episode from The Watch on Spotify. Chris and Andy talk about the fifth and final season of 'Le Bureau des Légendes' and reflect on the series as a whole (1:00) before they are joined by creator Éric Rochant to talk about making the show (54:45).Hosts: Chris Ryan and Andy GreenwaldGuest: Éric RochantProducer: Kaya McMullen Learn more about your ad choices. Visit podcastchoices.com/adchoices
